description: This file declares external API functions for an LPC Connector module associated with the Advanced Networking Service Container (ANSC). It includes function prototypes for creating, removing, enrolling objects, initializing, and resetting the LPC connector, serving as an interface definition header.

methods.name: AnscCreateLpcConnector
methods.description: Constructor for creating an LPC connector, with container and owner context handles, returning a handle to the created object.

methods.name: AnscLpccoCreate
methods.description: Function to instantiate the LPC connector object with given context handles.

methods.name: AnscLpccoRemove
methods.description: Function to remove or delete the LPC connector object.

methods.name: AnscLpccoEnrollObjects
methods.description: Function to register or enroll associated objects within the LPC connector.

methods.name: AnscLpccoInitialize
methods.description: Function to initialize the LPC connector object.

methods.name: AnscLpccoReset
methods.description: Function to reset the state of the LPC connector object.
